CustomField.formula: If(ISBLANK(Name),0,25)+ If(ISBLANK(DUNS_Number__c),0,25)+ If(ISBLANK(ShippingStreet),0,7)+ If(ISBLANK(ShippingCity),0,6) + If(ISBLANK(ShippingState),0,6) + If(ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode),0,6) + If(ISBLANK(BillingStreet),0,7)+ If(ISBLANK(BillingCity),0,6) + If(ISBLANK(BillingState),0,6) + If(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode),0,6)
CustomField.label: Data Completeness Scores
